description: Contributed to Agile sprints delivering secure, scalable full-stack applications. Focused on clean code, performance optimization, and intuitive UI/UX designs to improve digital services for public systems.
achievements: Engineered secure authentication using JWT & OAuth2, improving login success rate by 30%
Automated 60% of manual booking tasks for the Odisha Government
Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways to streamline digital services
Enhanced backend efficiency by 30% via caching and tuning
Designed accessible, modular UI in Figma and React, boosting dev speed and accessibility
